dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Virgin's new cruise line, right? They're bringing back those super traditional, grand old ocean liners, white gloves and everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Virgin's new cruise line, right? They're bringing back those super traditional, grand old ocean liners, white gloves and everything.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Branson's brainstorm-at-sea has steered its plans toward a fun, youthful, active vibe with barrier-breaking edginess: sea travel for those who would not readily consider themselves traditional cruisers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, uh, actually, the complete opposite.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, uh, actually, the complete opposite.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? So not like, stuffy formal wear.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? So not like, stuffy formal wear.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Not at all! It's like, adults-only, first of all. And they're calling it, um, the Scarlet Lady.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not at all! It's like, adults-only, first of all. And they're calling it, um, the Scarlet Lady.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently being built at the Fincantieri shipyard in Genoa, Italy, the adults-only, 2,700-passenger Scarlet Lady is expected to heighten the buzz about what a cruise can be.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Adults only, yes, exactly! That's already, like, a game changer right there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Adults only, yes, exactly! That's already, like, a game changer right there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! And it's not for, you know, "traditional cruisers."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! And it's not for, you know, traditional cruisers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: sea travel for those who would not readily consider themselves traditional cruisers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Not traditional. So what, are we talking, like, VR pirate raids on board?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not traditional. So what, are we talking, like, V R pirate raids on board?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Immersive simulations! And like, deep-sea exploration, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Immersive simulations! And like, deep-sea exploration, too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article does not mention immersive simulations or deep-sea exploration. It describes health and wellness facilities such as: The B-Complex will harbor Build, Burn, Bike and Balance areas with state-of-the-art exercise and gymnastics equipment overlooking the seascape. Complimentary group fitness classes will be aplenty, as well as sunrise and sunset yoga.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Deep-sea exploration, wow. And, uh, I heard about some, like, health stuff, too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Deep-sea exploration, wow. And, uh, I heard about some, like, health stuff, too?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, "Vitamin Sea," they call it! A huge B-Complex for fitness, yoga, um, even a running track.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, Vitamin Sea, they call it! A huge B-Complex for fitness, yoga, um, even a running track.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Vitamin sea + ship-shape moves Health and well-being are top onboard goals. ... The B-Complex will harbor Build, Burn, Bike and Balance areas with state-of-the-art exercise and gymnastics equipment overlooking the seascape. Complimentary group fitness classes will be aplenty, as well as sunrise and sunset yoga. ... as well as the running and skating track.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Running track, yes! And, like, a zen master meditation garden, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Running track, yes! And, like, a zen master meditation garden, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article mentions sunrise and sunset yoga, but does not mention a zen master meditation garden.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! And a spa called Redemption, with, like, cold plunge pools and salt rooms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! And a spa called Redemption, with, like, cold plunge pools and salt rooms.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Another interesting moniker has been fastened to the spa, called Redemption, which will indulge with a menu of massages plus a hydrotherapy pool, mud room, cold plunge pools, on-trend salt room and quartz beds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Salt rooms, yes, exactly! And no single-use plastics either!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Salt rooms, yes, exactly! And no single-use plastics either!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Virgin Voyages, single-use plastics for passengers will be banned: beverage bottles, coffee cups, condiment packets, food packaging, shopping bags, stirrers and straws.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: None! Banning everything, like, bottles, straws, all of it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: None! Banning everything, like, bottles, straws, all of it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. And the Scarlet Squad for women? For, like, marine positions?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. And the Scarlet Squad for women? For, like, marine positions?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Mentorship for women in, like, technical roles. It's totally oversubscribed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Mentorship for women in, like, technical roles. It's totally oversubscribed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article mentions the Scarlet Squad program to support women in marine, hotel and technical management roles, but does not state whether the program is oversubscribed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oversubscribed. Man, this is, uh, really changing the game.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oversubscribed. Man, this is, uh, really changing the game.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's like, the future of cruising, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's like, the future of cruising, honestly.
